name: Improve Code a Little

on:
  workflow_dispatch:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
      - master

jobs:
  improve:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          token: ${{ secrets.GH_PAT }}

      - name: Set up Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: '20'

      - name: Install GitHub Copilot CLI
        run: |
          npm install -g @githubnext/github-copilot-cli || echo "Copilot CLI install failed or not available."

      - name: Run GitHub Copilot CLI (if available)
        run: |
          if command -v copilot &> /dev/null; then
            copilot suggest . --write || echo "Copilot CLI ran but did not apply changes."
          else
            echo "Copilot CLI not installed. Skipping Copilot step."
          fi

      - name: Install Prettier
        run: npm install --save-dev prettier

      - name: Run Prettier (small improvement)
        run: npx prettier --write .

      - name: Commit and push changes
        run: |
          git config --global user.name 'github-actions[bot]'
          git config --global user.email 'github-actions[bot]@users.noreply.github.com'
          git add .
          if ! git diff --cached --quiet; then
            git commit -m "chore: auto-improve code a little [skip ci]"
            git push
          fi
